post: I completely believe the image is that of Christ our saviour as well. There is a lot of compelling evidence to say that it is but in the end, you decide by your faith. I was looking at a photograph of it and noticed that the eyes are slightly open. Can you see this too? I wonder sometimes whether the image was formed when he was dead or during the Resurrection. Thank you for sharing your vision :).

post: One other thing… I’m not so sure it would be agood thing for the Shroud to be proven as being what is it. I think when you know, you just know and you don’t need accurate carbon dating tests. However, if the whole population weer suddenly given evidence that it was real, it might not encourage faith and could cause many problems. We need to believe first..
